titles.title: A resolution honoring the 50th anniversary of hiring Robert Montgomery "Bobby" Knight as the Head Coach of the men's basketball team at Indiana University.
A resolution honoring the 50th anniversary of hiring Robert Montgomery "Bobby" Knight as the Head Coach of the men's basketball team at Indiana University.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate honoring Robert Montgomery "Bobby" Knight, collegiate men's basketball coach at Indiana University.
